API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.parser.ColladaImage

defined in
sandy.parser.ColladaParser
Transforms a COLLADA XML document into Sandy geometries.

Creates a Group as rootnode which appends all geometries it finds. Recommended settings for the COLLADA exporter:

  • Relative paths
  • Triangulate
  • Normals

Fields in

var bitmapData : flash.display.BitmapData

var fileName : String

var id : String
